parameters.name: startTime
parameters.description: Starting time of the time range for which the statistics should be fetched. The value must be expressed according to the GMT time zone.

schema.description: Starting time of the time range for which the statistics should be fetched. The value must be expressed according to the GMT time zone.

parameters.name: endTime
parameters.description: Ending time of the time range for which the statistics should be fetched. The value must be expressed according to the GMT time zone.

schema.description: Ending time of the time range for which the statistics should be fetched. The value must be expressed according to the GMT time zone.

get.description: This API displays the trend related to topic types (announcement, discussion, idea, problem, and question), on the community dashboard.
